document.full_text: world number two novak djokovic, unbeaten this year, said on friday he was pulling out of next week's monte carlo masters due to a knee injury.
document.title: form man djokovic out of monte carlo with knee injury
lines_and_colors: world number two novak djokovic, unbeaten this year, said on friday he was pulling out of next week's monte carlo masters due to a knee injury.
